title: Hidden in Plain View - EP
description:
Hidden in Plain View is Hidden in Plain View&#039;s eponymous Drive-Thru Records debut. The CD was issued on November 11, 2003 and marks the band&#039;s third release, after their first two EPs Find (2001) and Operation: Cut-Throat (2002).


Track listing

(all songs written by Hidden in Plain View)

   1. "Shamans Witches Magic" ? 3:46
   2. "The Chaser" ? 3:02
   3. "Where the Highways End" ? 3:15
   4. "Belly Full of Kerosene" ? 3:09
   5. "Twenty Below" (hidden track) ? 3:33




Ripped at 192 kbps
